mainText:
I recently watched a documentary about Steve Job's life and the genesis 
of Apple Computers.  I became an Apple user in 1999 and have been one 
ever since.  I am grateful to Steve Jobs and the other hard workers at 
Apple for making things that work.  I  also recently read something 
Steve said about living for your passion and it resonated deeply in me.

Rare people like Steve Jobs are certainly missed but more than that, you 
wonder how things would be without their inspiration and innovation.
author: Greg
